column6: **Help**: Chat with the AI assistant about your topic. The timer will count down your remaining time. You can send messages with the _Send_ button or by hitting enter. Click _Finish Chatting_ when done.
column7: Limit your answers to around 50 words. Do not refer to your word limit.
column8: Do you oppose or support this policy?
column9: This policy would be a bad idea.
column10: This policy would be a good idea.
column11: How informed do you feel about this issue?
column12: How informed do you _now_ feel about this issue?
column13: How in control or satisfied do you feel of this aspect of your personal wellbeing?
column14: How in control or satisfied do you _now_ feel of this aspect of your personal wellbeing?

column6: **Help**: Rate the assistant on the provided scales. Consider how the assistant performed during your conversation. There are no right or wrong answers - use your subjective judgment for each rating.
column21: Rate the conversation with the AI assistant. There are no right or wrong answers. Use your subjective judgement.
